content: You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing combat maneuvers.  Benefit: You add your Dexterity bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus (see Combat) instead of your Strength bonus.  Normal: You add your Strength bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus.
htmlcontent:
You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing combat maneuvers.

Benefit: You add your Dexterity bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus (see Combat) instead of your Strength bonus.

Normal: You add your Strength bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus.
name: Agile Maneuvers (Combat)
